tags.title: param
tags.description: The id of the document to search. Pass the empty string ('') to search the entire collection.
tags.name: documentID

tags.title: param
tags.description: The query object. For exact matching, this object contains the field name and field value to match. For matching based on comparison, this object contains the field name and the comparison expression. For matching based on logical operators, this object contains an expression using MongoDB syntax. See the underlying [Data API](../../../rest_apis/data_api/#searching) for additional examples.
tags.name: query

tags.title: param
tags.description: Available fields include: `sort`, and `direction` (`asc` or `desc`).
tags.name: outputModifier

tags.title: param
tags.description: Overrides for configuration options.
tags.name: options

tags.title: return
tags.description: Boolean value as to if it's local
